p: Samples (2.0 g) of leaves and fruits of P. nigrum were extracted by percolation (96 h) with 100 mL of methanol. Every 48 h, the samples were placed on ultrasound for 10 min. At the end of 96 h, the solvent was evaporated. The extracts were used for Folinâ€“Ciocalteu total phenolic and total carotenoids determination [ 107, 108, 109].
